DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Focused Ultrasound Ablation Virus Myomectomy to Treat Uterine Fibroids
DOC.detailed_description: Uterine fibroids (leiomyomas) are common in reproductive aged women. Patients are seeking new ways to treat symptomatic uterine fibroids that allow them to avoid surgery. High intensity focused ultrasound therapy (HIFU) is a novel non-invasive method for uterine fibroid. Preliminary clinical studies proved HIFU ablation is a safe and effective technology. However, it is not clear whether HIFU has superiority over traditional surgery on satisfaction and adverse impact.The study is to confirm these questions.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 to 45; The size of fibroid situated at anterior wall not lower than 2 cm in MRI feature; The size of fibroid situated at posterior wall not lower than 4 cm in MRI feature.
